allow: Bash(python -m json.tool "【大道朝天】专用预设.json")

Bash(python -c "
import json

with open(''【大道朝天】专用预设.json'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8'') as f:
    data = json.load(f)

# 打印当前顺序
for i, p in enumerate(data[''prompts'']):
    name = p.get(''name'', p.get(''identifier'', ''''))
    order = p.get(''injection_order'', 0)
    print(f''{i+1}. [{order:3d}] {name}'')
")
